definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: go or come out (NH id.; Aram. [[יְעָא]]; Eth. waz’0a:, was’0a As âṣû Dl:HWB 237, all = go out, forth; Syr. yi9o0 go forth (in sense of germinate), grow; Ph. [[יחא]] march out; cf. SI:5 [[המוחא]] the source (of water); Sab. [[וחַא]] go out, DHM in MV; Ar. wad.uw’a is be or become fair, beautiful, neat, clean, cf. Nö:ZMG 1886, 725)—Pf. [[יׇחָא]] Ge 10:11 + 92 t.; 3 fs. [[יׇֽחְאָה]] Nu 16:35 + 13 t.; [[יׇחָָאָה]] Is 28:29; 2 ms. [[יׇחָאתָ]] Ge 24:5 + 7 t.; 2 fs. [[וְיׇחָאת]] Je 31:4; 2 mpl. [[יְחָאתֶם]] Ex 13:3, De 11:10 [[וִיחָאתֶם]] Ju Jdg 21:21, Mal 3:20; 3 pl. sf. [[יְחָאֻנִי]] Je 10:20, etc.; Impf. [[יֵחֵא]] Ge 15:4 + 64 t.; [[וַיֵּחֵא]] Ge 4:16 + 132 t.; 3 fs. [[תֵּחֵא]] Ex 21:7 + 22 t.; [[וַתֵּחֵא]] Ge 30:16 + 14 t.; 2 ms. [[תֵּחֵא]] De 20:1 + 16 t.; 3 pl. [[יֵחְאוּ]] Ge 15:14 +; [[יֵחֵָאוּ]] Ge 17:6 +; 3 fpl. [[וַתֵּחֶ֫אנׇה]] 1Sa 18:6, 2Ki 2:24; [[וַתֵּחֶאןָ]] Ex 15:20; 2 fpl. [[תֵּחֶ֫אנׇה]] Am 4:3, etc.; Imv. [[חֵא]] Ge 8:16 + 15 t.; [[וׇחֵָאָה]] Ju Jdg 9:29; fs. [[חְאִי]] Ct So 1:8; mpl. Ge 19:14 + 11 t.; [[חֵָאוּ]] Is 49:9, Ez Eze 9:7 + Je 58:8 Qr (Kt [[יֵחֵָאוּ]]) [[חְאֶינׇה]] Ct So 3:11; Inf. abs. [[יׇחוֹא]] Ge 8:7 + 2 t.; [[יׇחאׁ]] Ge 27:30 + 3 t.; Inf. cstr. [[חֵאת]] Ge 24:11 + 31 t.; sf. [[חֵאתִי]] Ex 9:29 + 3 t.; [[חֵאתֵנוּ]] Joe 9:12; [[חֵאתְְ]] De 16:3 + 10 t., etc.; Pt. [[יׁחֵא]] ([[יוֹחֵא]]) Ge 2:10 + 62 t.; fs. [[שֶׁיּׁחָא]] Ec 10:5; [[יׁחֵאת]] (´[[יו]]) Ge 24:15 + 11 t.; [[יׁחֵת]] De 28:37, etc.;—
go or come out or forth:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: from ([[מִן]]) a place, e.g. a tent Ge 31:33 (E; opp. [[בּוֹא בְ]]), [[מִפֶּתַח אׂהֶל מוֹעֵד]] Le 8:33, Le 10:7 (P), cf. [[מִן־הַמִּקְדָּשׁ]] Le 21:22 (H); from a house 2Sa 11:8, the doors ([[דלתי]]) of a house Jos 2:19 (JE), Ju Jdg 11:31; [[מִפֶתח ביתו]] Ex 12:22 (JE), from a camp 1Sa 13:17, 2Ki 7:12, a city Ge 19:14 (J), Ge 12:4 (P), 1Ki 11:29, 1Ki 20:17, Mic 4:10, a cave 1Sa 24:9, the ark Ge 9:18 (J), Ge 8:16, Ge 8:19 (both P); out of vineyards Ju Jdg 21:21; sq. acc. [[אֶת־הָעִיר]] Ge 44:4 (E), Ex 9:29 (J); c. [[בְּ]] also, of gate Je 17:19, Ne 2:13; sq. acc. local. [[לאׁ אֵחֵא פָָתַח]] Job 31:34; pt. cstr. [[יׁחְאֵי הֵַתּבָה]] Ge 9:10 (P), [[יׁחְאֵי שַׁעַר עִירוֹ]] Ge 34:24 (P); abs. Jos 2:5 (JE), Ju Jdg 3:24, Ex 34:34 (P), Nu 33:3 (P; Israel going out [from Egypt]), 2 Ch 2Ch 26:20 +; specify., of going out ([[מִן]]) from a land (of emigration) Ge 10:11, Ge 10:14, Ge 24:5 (all J); patric. of coming forth from (the land of) Egypt (the Exodus) Ex 12:41 (J), Ex 13:3, Ex 13:8, Ex 23:15, Ex 34:18, Nu 11:20, Nu 22:5 (all JE), and esp. D, De 4:45, De 4:46, De 9:7, De 11:10, De 16:3, De 16:3, De 16:6, De 23:5, De 24:9, De 25:17, Jos 2:10, Jos 5:4, Jos 5:5, Jos 5:6 (all D), Nu 33:1 (P), 1Ki 6:1 1Ki 8:9 = 2Ch 5:10, 2Ki 21:15, Je 7:25, Hag 2:5, Ps 114:1.

definitions.title: b
definitions.body: go forth from (the presence of) a person: Ex 8:26, Ex 9:33, Ex 10:6 (all sq. [[מֵעִם]]), Ge 44:28, Ex 5:20, Je 2:37 ([[מֵאֵת]]), Ju Jdg 3:19 ([[מֵעָלָיו]]); sq. [[מִלִּפְנֵי]] Ge 4:16 (J), Ge 41:46, Ge 47:10, Es 8:15, Ec 10:5; sq. [[מֵעִם פְּנֵי]] Job 1:12, [[מֵאֵת פְּנֵי]] Job 2:7; sq. sf. [[יְחָאֻנִי]] Je 10:20 (v. De Ec 7:18).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in technical senses: abs. go forth, of emancipation Ex 21:2, Ex 21:3, Ex 21:3, Ex 21:4, Ex 21:5, Ex 21:7, Ex 21:7, Ex 21:7, Ex 21:11 (all JE), cf. [[יחא מִתַּחַת יַד־אֲרָם]] 2Ki 13:5; of release in the year of jubilee, land, etc. Lv Le 25:28, Le 25:30, Le 25:31, Le 25:33 (all H), Le 27:21 (P); also of a debtor-slave Le 25:54 (H); sf. divorce [[וְיׇֽחְאָה מִבֵּיתוֹ]] De 24:2; of condemnation [[בְּהִשָּֽׁפְטוֹ יֵחֵא רָשָׁע]] Ps 109:7 when he is judged let him go out as a criminal, i.e. be condemned: of bowels ([[מֵעִים]]) falling out by reason of disease 2Ch 21:15, 2Ch 21:19.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of flight, involving escape: sq. [[הַחוּ֫חָה]], ‖[[נוּס]], flee Ge 39:12, Ge 39:15 (J), [[כִּי נׇחאׁ תֵחֵא]] Je 48:9; opp. taken (by lot) 1Sa 14:41; [[רָעָה אֲשֶׁר]] [[לאׁ־יוּכְלוּ לָחֵאת מִמֶָּנׇּה]] Je 11:11 calamity from which they shall not be able to escape; perh. also [[יְרֵא]] [[אֱלֽהִים יֵחֵא אֶת־כֻּלָּם]] Ec 7:18 he that feareth God shall escape (or be freed from, v. De Hi-Now Mishn) all of them (see VB),—on acc. with [[יחא]] v. De.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: depart [[בְּחֵאת נַפְשָׁהּ]] Ge 35:18 i.e. when she was expiring; so [[תֵּחֵא רוּחוֹ]] Ps 146:4; [[בְּחֵאת הַיַּיִן מִנׇּבָל]] 1Sa 25:27 i.e. when Nabal became sober; also fig. [[וַיֵּחֵא לִבָּם]] Ge 42:28 (E) i.e. their heart failed (‖[[וַיֶּחֶרְדוּ]]); rust from ([[מִן]]) caldron Ez Eze 24:16 (v. Co Ez Eze 12:5); of glory of ´[[י]] Eze 10:18; [[וַיֵּחֵא]] [[מִן בַּת־חִיּוֹן כָּל־הֲדָרָהּ]] La 1:6; hence inf. = exit, end [[בְּחֵאת הַשָּׁנׇה]] Ex 23:16 (JE), and, refundantly, [[כְּעֵת]] [[חֵאת הַקֵּץ לְיׇמִים שְׁנַיִם]] 2Ch 21:19 i.e. at the end of two years

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of inanimate things: river out of Eden Ge 2:10 (J), water out of rock Ex 17:6 (E), Nu 20:11 (JE), from Lehi Ju Jdg 15:19; of molten calf out of fire Ex 32:24(E); of gold (after refining) Job 23:10 (abs., in sim.); in prophecy of fountain from house of ´[[י]] Ez Eze 47:1, Eze 47:8, Eze 47:12, Zec 14:8, Joe 4:18; of seed (semen virile) from man Le 15:16, Le 15:32 (P), Le 22:4 (H); of weapon which has pierced body 2Sa 2:23 ([[מֵאַחֲרָיו]]), 2Ki 9:24 ([[מִלִּבּוֹ]]), Job 20:25 ([[מִגֵּוַה]]); [[וַתֵּחֵא אַחֲרָיו מַשְׂאַת הַמֶּלֶח]] 2Sa 11:8 and there went out ( = was sent out) after him the king's portion (i.e. the food given by the king); idiomatically of expenditure of money 2Ki 12:13 (abs., cf. Hiph. v:2Ki 12:12); of swift movement of arrow from bow Zec 9:14 (like lightning), of lightning out of fire Ez Eze 1:13; abs. of sunrise (subj. [[שֶׁמֶשׁ]]) Ju Jdg 5:31 (in sim.), Ge 19:23, cf. Is 13:10 (so As., e.g. ultu ṣît šanši adi êrib šanši COT Ge 19:23); of rising of stars ([[כּוֹכָבִים]]) Ne 4:15; of sentence of judge Hb Hab 1:4, Hab 1:4, Ps 17:2; of judgment, or right appearing (with sim. of light) Ho 6:5 (rd. [[וּמִשְׁפָּמִי כָאוֹר יֵחֵא]]), Is 62:1; of a lot [[וַיֵּחֵא הַנּוֹרָל לִבְנֵי יוֹסֵף]] Jos 16:1 (JE), and esp. P, Nu 33:54, Jos 19:1, Jos 19:17, Jos 19:24, Jos 19:32, Jos 19:40, Jos 21:4, cf. also [[ויחא גְּבוּל גּוֹרָלָם]] Jos 18:11 (P)

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: with especial emphasis on idea of origin, source: hyssop out of the wall 1Ki 5:13; [[מיהוה יחא הדבר]] Ge 24:50 (J) from ´[[י]] has the thing proceeded, of a providential arrangement, so ´[[מֵעִם י]] Is 28:29; [[מֵרְשָׁעִים יֵחֵא רֶשַׁע]] 1Sa 24:14 (an ancient proverb); of pollution proceeding from ([[מֵאֵת]]) prophets Je 23:15; of fire from Heshbon Nu 21:28 (JE), Je 48:45, cf. Ju Jdg 9:15, Jdg 9:20, Jdg 9:20; of fire ´[[מִלִּפְנֵי י]] Le 9:24, Le 10:2, ´[[מֵאֵת י]] Nu 16:35 (all P); in theophany [[יחא רֶשֶׁף לְרַגְליו]] Hb Hab 3:5; iniquity from unreceptive heart Ps 73:7 (v. I. [[הֵלֶב]]

); wrath ´[[מִלִּפְנֵי י]] Nu 17:11 (P); abs. Je 4:4 = Je 21:12, Je 23:19 = Je 30:23; so salvation Is 51:5; [[וְנִשְׁמַת־מִי יׇֽחְאָה מִמֶָּ֑]] Job 26:4; of words going forth from mouth of speaker (of solemn or formal speech) [[מִפִּיכֶם דָּבָר לאׁ יֵחֵא]] Jos 6:10 (JE), Ju Jdg 11:26, 1Sa 2:3, Je 44:17, Job 37:2, Es 7:8, also Nu 30:3, Nu 32:24 (both P); of ´[[י]]'s words going forth from his mouth, or from him Is 45:23, Is 48:3, Is 51:4, Is 55:11, Ez Eze 33:30; of ´[[י]]'s words, instruction, command, etc., going froth Is 2:3 = Mic 4:2 (from Jerusalem), Da 9:23; of human commandment Es 1:19, cf. v:Es 1:17.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: of children as going forth from loins (of father) [[מִמֵּעִים]] 2Sa 7:12, 2Sa 16:11; [[מֵחֲלָחִים]] Ge 35:11 (P), 1Ki 8:19 = 2Ch 6:9; sq. [[מִן]] alone 2Ki 20:18 = Is 39:7; also [[יׁחְאֵי יְרֵכוֹ]] Ju Jdg 8:30, Ge 46:26, Ex 1:5 (both P); also of birth [[מֵרֶחֶם]] ([[אִמּוֹ]]) Nu 12:12 (JE), Je 1:5, Je 20:18, Job 3:11; fig. of sea Job 38:9, of ice v:Job 38:29; [[מִבֶּטֶן אִמּוֹ]] Job 1:21, Ec 5:14; lit., source not expr., Ge 25:25, Ge 25:26, Ge 38:28, Ge 38:29, Ge 38:30 (all J); of untimely birth Ex 21:22 (JE); cf. [[היּוֹחֵ֠ת מִבֵּין רַגְלֶיהָ]] De 28:57 (‖[[תֵּלֵד]]); of family or race connexion (sq. [[מִן]]) Na 1:11, Is 48:1, 1Ch 1:12, 1Ch 2:53; [[יחא]] also of produce of vine ([[מִגֶּפֶן]]) Ju Jdg 13:14, cf. [[הַיּׁחֵא הַשָּׂדֶה]] De 14:22 (rd. [[יחא]] Sam., v. Di); [[אֶרֶץ מִמֶּנׇּה יחא לֶחֶם]] Job 28:5; of viper proceeding from serpent's root Is 14:29; further, with idea of unfolding, growth Job 8:16, Job 14:2, Job 31:40; [[וְיׇחָא חׂטֶר מִגֶּזַע יִשָָׁי]] Is 11:1; of the little horn Da 8:9; so of branches of candlestick in tabernacle Ex 25:32, Ex 25:33, Ex 25:35, Ex 37:18, Ex 37:19, Ex 37:21 (all P); then simply project  (tower from wall) Ne 3:25, Ne 3:26, Ne 3:27; of measuring-line going forth (abs.) in a particular direction Je 31:39; of a boundary (-line) going out (abs.) so as then to turn and make an angle Nu 34:4, Nu 34:9, Jos 15:3, Jos 15:4, Jos 15:9, Jos 15:11, Jos 15:11, Jos 16:2, Jos 16:6, Jos 16:7, Jos 18:15, Jos 18:15, Jos 18:17, Jos 18:17, Jos 19:12, Jos 19:13, Jos 19:27, Jos 19:34, Jos 19:47.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: go forth to a place Ge 27:3 (J), Je 14:18, Ez Eze 3:22, Zec 6:6, Zec 6:6, Zec 6:7 +; so [[וַיֵּחֵא הַפַּרְשְׁדׂ֫נׇה]] Ju Jdg 3:22 (see VB); go forth in surrender 1Sa 11:3 (sq. [[אֶל]] pers.) 2Ki 18:31 = Is 36:16, Je 38:17, Je 38:21; [[אֵין פֶּרֶץ וְאֵין]] [[יוֹחֵאת]] Ps 144:14; into captivity [[לאׁ יׇֽחְאוּ אִתְּכֶם]] [[בַּגּוֹלָה]] Je 29:16, cf. Je 48:7, Zec 14:2; also [[יׇחָא מִן־הַמָּקוֹם]] [[הַזֶּה]] Je 22:11, cf. [[בָּנַי יְחָאֻנִי]] Je 10:20.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: go forward proceed to or toward something, fig., [[מֵרָעָה אֶל־]] [[רָעָה יׇחָָאוּ]] Je 9:2 from evil to evil they go on; in like manner 2Sa 20:8 si vera l., but read rather [[וְהִיא יׇֽחְאָה]] and it (i.e. the sword) came out (of the sheath) and fell LXX We Dr Kit Bu.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: come or go forth, with esp. ref. to purpose or result: [[וְיׇחָאתִי אַחֲרָיו וְהִכִּתִיו]] 1Sa 17:35, cf. 1Sa 24:15; [[יׇחָא שָׁאוּל]] [[לְבַקֵּשׁ נַפְשׁוֹ]] 1Sa 23:15, cf. 1Sa 26:20, further 2Sa 2:13, 2Sa 18:4, 1Ki 20:18, 1Ki 20:18, 1Ki 20:19, 1Ki 20:39, 2Ki 5:2, Mic 1:11, Je 37:5, Zec 14:3, Da 11:11, Da 11:44 +; of an adulteress Pr 7:15; of an angel Nu 22:32 (JE), Da 9:22; for [[אִתְּכֶם]] …[[יֵחֵא ]] 1Sa 22:3 (let my father etc.go forth [to be] with you, cf. Klo) rd. perh. [[יֵשְׁבוּ]] as SyrVer Vulgate Kit, v. also Dr; of army marching out to form battle line [[יׁחֵא אֶל־הַמַּעֲרָכָה]] 1Sa 17:20 (c. art., MT, < om. We Dr Kit Bu); [[בְּכׂל אֲשֶׁר יׇֽחְאוּ]] Ju Jdg 2:15 in all to which they went forth, [[יׇחָא לפני]] 1Sa 8:20 of king going out at the head of his soldiers; so of ´[[י]] before his people Ju Jdg 4:14, 2Sa 5:24, Ps 68:8, cf. Ps 108:12, 1Ch 14:15; of ´[[י]] going out from Seir Ju Jdg 5:14, cf. Hb Hab 3:13; of the hand of ´[[י]], in hostility ´[[יׇֽחְאָה בִי יַד־י]] Ru 1:13; abs. of fire breaking out Ex 22:5 (JE).

of combinations, note esp.: [[יׇחוֹא וׇשׁוֹב]] (inf. abs.) Ge 8:7 going out and returning, nearly = to and fro; [[יׁחֵא יׇחוֹא]] …[[אִישׁ יוֹחֵא ]] [[וּמְקַלֵּל]] 2Sa 16:5 = coming forth, cursing as he came; [[יחא ובא]], lit. [[אֵין יוֹחֵא וְאֵין בָּא]] Jos 6:1 none went out and none came in, i.e. there was no free egress or ingress (of besieged city), cf. 1Ki 15:17 = 2Ch 16:1, 2Ch 15:5; to go out  and come in before, of leader in war Nu 27:17, 1Sa 18:16, cf. 1Sa 29:6; fig. De 28:6 blessed shalt thou be [[בבואך ובחאתך]], i.e. when thou completest and beginnest any undertaking, so v:De 28:19, De 31:2 [[לא אוכל לחאת ולבוא]], i.e. I can no more engage in active undertakings; similarly Jos 14:11, 1Ki 3:7, Is 37:28 ( + [[שִׁבְתְְּ]]) = 2Ki 19:27, Ps 121:8.
cause to go or come out, bring out, lead out:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: a person from a place, + [[מִן]] loc., out of prison, etc. Ge 40:14 (E), Je 20:3, Je 52:31 (not ‖ 2Ki 25:27); so with the servant of ´[[י]] subj. Is 42:7; out of house Jos 6:22 (JE), a city Ge 19:12 (J), Ez Eze 14:22 (so LXX SyrVer Vulgate Co VB; MT Hoph.); of ´[[י]] bringing people of Jerusalem out of city to deliver them to enemy Ez Eze 11:7 (MT (one) shall bring, but rd. 1 s., see VB), v:Eze 11:9; fr. a land Je 26:33; esp. of Moses bringing Israelites out of Egypt Ex 3:10, Ex 3:11, Ex 3:12 (E), Ex 14:11 (J); of Moses and Aaron Ex 6:13, Ex 6:26, Ex 6:27 (P); of ´[[י]] bringing Israelites out of ([[מִן]]) Egypt Ex 18:1, Ex 20:2, Jos 24:6 (all E), Ex 13:3, Ex 13:9, Ex 13:14, Ex 13:16, Ex 32:11, Nu 20:16, Nu 23:22, Nu 24:8, (all JE), De 1:27, De 4:20, De 4:37, De 5:6, De 5:15, De 6:12, De 6:21, De 6:23, De 8:14, De 9:12, De 9:26, De 9:28, De 13:6, De 13:11, De 16:1, De 26:8 (all D), Le 19:36, Le 22:33, Le 23:43, Le 25:38, Le 25:44, Le 25:55, Le 26:13, Le 26:45 (all H), Ex 6:6, Ex 6:7 ([[מִתַּחַת סִבְלֽת מחרים]]), Ex 7:4, Ex 7:5, Ex 12:17, Ex 12:42, Ex 12:51, Ex 16:6, Ex 16:32, Ex 29:46, Nu 15:41 (all P), Ju Jdg 2:12, Jdg 6:8, 1Sa 12:8, 1Ki 8:16 = 2Ch 6:5, 1Ki 8:21, 1Ki 8:51, 1Ki 8:53, 1Ki 9:9, Je 7:22, Je 11:4, Je 31:32, Je 32:21, Je 34:13, Ez Eze 20:6, Eze 20:10, cf. v:Eze 20:9 (del. Co), 2Ch 7:22, Ps 136:11, Da 9:15; abs., same sense, Jos 24:5 (E), De 7:8, De 7:19, Ez Eze 20:14, Eze 20:22, Ps 105:37, Ps 105:43; of ´[[י]] bringing Israelites out of exile (sq. [[מִן]]) Ez Eze 20:34, Eze 20:41, Eze 34:13; obj. rebels (out of, [[מִן]], land) Ez Eze 20:38; of charioteer bringing Ahab out of battle 1Ki 22:34 = 2Ch 18:33; of Joseph's bringing out his sons from between Jacob's knees Ge 48:12 (E).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of bringing from a place for a particular purpose (human subj.) Ex 19:17 ([[מִן]]); also (point of departure not expr., and purpose sometimes only implied) Ge 38:24 (J), Jos 2:3, Jos 6:23, Jos 6:23, Ju Jdg 6:30, 2Sa 12:31 = 1Ch 20:3, 2Ki 11:12 = 2Ch 23:11, 2Ch 23:14, Is 43:8; ´[[י]] subj., of bringing Israelites out of Egypt to slay them Ex 32:16 (JE), De 9:28, De 9:29; obj. Gog Ez Eze 38:4; subj. ´[[יַד י]] Ez Eze 37:1.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: lead out as an army 2Sa 10:16 = 1Ch 19:16, so of ´[[י]] Is 43:17; hence with [[הֵבִיא]], of a ruler's function to lead people out and in 2Sa 5:2 = 1Ch 11:2, Nu 27:17 (P).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[הוֹחִיא מֵרֶחֶם]] of God's agency in birth Job 10:18.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: = remove (from a person's presence) [[הוֹחִיאוּ כָל־אִישׁ מֵעָלָָי]] Ge 45:1, 2Sa 13:9; without ‖[[מעל]] v:2Sa 13:18.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of putting away wives and children Ezr 10:3, Ezr 10:19 (opp. [[הוֹשִׁיב]] v:Ezr 10:2, cf. [[יחאה מביתו]] De 24:2).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: bring out person unto ([[אֶל]]) a place (human subj.) Jos 10:22, Jos 10:23 (JE), De 17:5, De 22:21, De 22:24 (all D), Le 24:14, Le 24:23 (H), Nu 15:36 (P; all [[אֶל־מִחוּץ]]), 1Ki 21:10, 1Ki 21:13 ([[מִחוּץ]] of motion to), 2Ki 11:15 = 2Ch 23:14; [[לְהוֹחִאֵהוּ אֶל־הַבָָּיִת]] Je 39:14; subj. angels in form of men Ge 19:16, Ge 19:17 (J), Ez Eze 42:1, Eze 42:15, Eze 46:21, Eze 47:2; also Ge 15:5 (JE; ´[[י]] subj.); for a specific purpose Ex 16:3 (P).

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: unto a person Ge 43:23 (J), with purpose expressed or implied Ho 9:13, Ge 19:5, Ge 19:8 (J), Ju Jdg 19:22, Jdg 19:24, Jos 10:24 (JE), Je 38:23, Ezr 8:7 (c. [[על]]) Kt (but read Qr [[אֲחַוֶּה]]).

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: unto a place and a person Jos 10:22, Jos 10:23 (JE), De 21:19, Ju Jdg 19:25.

fig., obj. persons, bring out of ([[מִן]]) distress, etc. Ps 25:17, Ps 68:7, Ps 107:14, Ps 107:28, Ps 142:8, Ps 143:11; deliver from enemies 2Sa 22:49 (but ‖ Ps 18:49 [[מְפַלְּטִי]]); one's feet out of net Ps 25:15, Ps 31:5; bring out into a large place 2Sa 22:20 = Ps 18:20, cf. Ps 66:12.
bring out animals: horses out of Egypt 1Ki 10:29 = 2Ch 1:17 (but read

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: [[יֵחְאוּ]] LXX Klo Kmp in Kau:AT), 2Ch 1:17, 2Ch 9:28; animals (from ark, no [[מן]]) Ge 8:17 (P);for sacrifice, to a place Nu 19:3.
inanimate obj.:

definitions.title: Qal,
definitions.body: cf. v:Eze 12:4, so Co), also Eze 24:6 (Co 24:10); obj. [[הָאֶבֶן הָראׁשָׁה]] Zec 4:7; Le 26:10 (H), Ezr 1:7, Ezr 1:7, Ezr 1:8.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: take or draw out (from one's person or luggage) Ge 24:53 (J); draw out hand from one's bosom Ex 4:6, Ex 4:7 (J), cf. Ru 2:18 (food from one's cupboard).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: bring outto a place De 28:38, Le 4:12, Le 4:21, Le 6:4, Le 14:45, Le 16:27, Ez Eze 46:20, cf. De 14:28.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: bring out to (or for) a person Ge 14:18, Ju Jdg 6:19 cf. v:Jdg 6:18, 1Ki 17:13, 2Ki 10:22, 2Ki 10:22.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: bring out from ([[מִן]]) a place to people Nu 17:24 (P).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: bring out in payment, pay (money, tribute, etc.) 2Ki 12:12, 2Ki 15:20 ([[עַל]] = in behalf of: or put it forth, imposed it, on Israel).

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: bring forth (= cause to rise or appear) the heavenly bodies Is 40:26, Job 38:32; see also [[וְתַעֲלֻמָה יׁחִא אוֹר]] Job 28:11 and hidden things he (the miner) bringeth forth tolight.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: bring forth by miracle: Moses. water out of rock Nu 20:8, Nu 20:10 (JE); ´[[י]] id. De 8:15, Ne 9:15, Ps 78:16.

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: = produce, generate, bring into being: of magicians trying to produce lice Ex 8:14 (P); a smith producing weapon Is 54:16; see the threefold [[הוחיא]] Pr 30:33, Pr 30:33, Pr 30:33; of ´[[י]] causing [[לֶחֶם]] to proceed out of ([[מִן]]) earth Ps 104:14; elsewhere of earth as producing Ge 1:12, Ge 1:24 (both P), Is 61:11, Hag 1:11; of Aaron's rod bringing forth blossoms Nu 17:28 (P).

definitions.title: k.
definitions.body: bring forth words (out of mouth, etc.), i.e. speak Job 8:10, Job 15:3, Pr 10:18, Pr 29:11, Ne 6:19, Is 48:20 (‖[[הגיד]], [[השׁמיע]]); abs. Ec 5:1; of publishing a report [[עָיֶהָ שֵׁם רָָע]] ´[[הו]] De 22:14 (‖[[שָׂם לָהּ]] [[עֲלִילֽת דְּבָרִים]]) cf. v:De 22:19; ([[רָעָה]] )[[דִּבַּת הָאָרֶץ ]] ´[[הו]] Nu 13:32, Nu 14:37; so Nu 14:36 ([[דִּבָּה עַל־הָאָרֶץ]]).

fig., subj. ´[[י]], bring forth from ([[מִן]]) Bel's mouth what he has swallowed Je 5:44; wind, out of treasuries Je 10:13, Je 51:16, Ps 135:7; fire, out of Tyre Ez Eze 28:18; curse, over the land Zec 5:4; of Jeremiah, [[מִוּוֹלֵל אִם תּוֹחִיא יׇקָר]] Je 15:19 if thou bring forth the precious from (Gie without) the base, i.e. if thou free that which is pure in thee from base admixture (Gf; Gie if thou produce the noble without the base); bring forth, i.e. exhibit, righteousness (nnocence Che) Ps 37:6, Je 51:10 (cf.

definitions.title: Qal 1 f
definitions.body: end); [[וַיּׁחֵא לָאוֹר חַלְמָוֶת]] Job 12:22, cf. Mic 7:9; subj. servant of ´[[י]] of publishing [[מִשְׁפָּט]] (i.e. religion) to the world Is 42:1, Is 42:3.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[הוּחָָאָה]] Ez Eze 38:8 (del.Co); Pt. fs. [[מוּחֵאת]] Ge 38:25; m.pl. [[מוּחָאִים]] Ge 14:22, Ge 47:8 (but v. infr.); f.pl. [[מוּחָאוֹת]] Je 38:22; —be brought forth Ge 38:25 ( J;of Tamar); of women as captives Je 38:22; remnant out of Jerusalem Ez Eze 14:22 MT (but rd. Hiph., v. supr.); exiles, from among the peoples Eze 38:8 (om. SerVer Co); of waters, [[אֶל־הַיׇּ֫מָּה הַמּוּחָאִים]] Ez Eze 47:8 which are caused to flow into the sea (but SerVer Co [[אֶל־הַמַּיִם הַחֲמוּאִים]] into the sour (bitter, salt) waters, see Field VB).
